content.rendered:
Frozen okra cut that is to be used for soups and gumbos. Freezing okra cut ensures this green goodness can make mealtime appearances all winter long.

Okra are delivered to the factory

The fresh okra are picked and washed

The fresh okra are removed stem

Okra are cut by machine

Fresh okra cuts are vacuum packed and frozen at -40 to -35 degrees celsius
